title: 4.3 Master Challenge 2
question: Open a new project and add a Ballerina sprite from the sprite library. Add different costumes of Ballerina to show the changing color of her dress. Program the Ballerina to change its costumes one after the other when the is clicked. For each costume, the Ballerina has to say the color of her dress
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
